title: The French Perspective On 2 Desperate Days Following 'Hebdo' Shooting
teaser: Renee Montagne speaks with Sylvie Rottman, senior producer at France 24, for the latest on the mood of the French people, who have been rocked by the shooting at the Charlie Hebdo offices.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
